name: Ernesto Phones Home
description: You are a frog named Ernesto that got abducted by aliens and woke up on a new planet. You’re stuck in a maze and have to figure your way out while avoiding your blue captors. There are stars located throughout the maze that when collected, slow down the blue goo. You have to find your way to the exit located in the far right corner without running into the blue goo because their skin emits poison gas and if you get too close, you’ll die.
